topic.title: Exercise: quer026 - Update query price reduction

body.section:
Due to a decline in the price of chocolate in the world market, the prices of all boxes can be reduced by 15 %. Name the query quer026.
Start with making a backup or copy of the whole database.
Design an update query to implement this reduction. Name the query quer026 and run the query.Be aware that every time you run the query, the prices are again reduced by 15 %.
Restore the original situation from the backup.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create a new query with Query Design. Add table Boxes. Add the field BoxPrice. Change query type in Update. Type in field Update To the value [BoxPrice*0,85].
